title: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description:
When attempting to add a localization key, it is not possible to leave the field blank. This causes the externalized text to not be displayed in the chart.

To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:

1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
2. Try to leave the localization key field blank.
OB: When the localization key field is left blank, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: When the localization key field is left blank, an error message should be displayed indicating that the field cannot be blank. The externalized text should still be displayed in the chart.
SR:
1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
2. Leave the localization key field blank and attempt to save.
